SELECT p.id, p.title, p.difficulty, p.tags, p.submission_count AS submissionCount, p.category, (CASE WHEN p.submission_count > 0 THEN (p.solved_count * 100.0 / p.submission_count) ELSE 0 END) AS passRate, (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 'Accepted') THEN 'COMPLETED' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId}) THEN 'ATTEMPTED' ELSE 'NOT_ATTEMPTED' END) AS status FROM problems p
AND (p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.title}, '%') OR p.id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query.title}, '%'))
AND p.difficulty = #{query.difficulty}
JSON_CONTAINS(p.tags, CAST(CONCAT('"', #{tag}, '"') AS JSON))
AND p.category = #{query.category}
AND
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 'Accepted')
EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId}) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 'Accepted')
NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM submissions s WHERE s.problem_id = p.id AND s.user_id = #{userId})
ORDER BY p.id ASC
